title: Successful User Onboarding
description: Verify that a new user can complete the onboarding process without errors, setting initial preferences.

steps.description: Launch the app as a new user.
Navigate through onboarding screens.
Set initial preferences as prompted.
Confirm onboarding completes and app navigates to login or home screen.

title: Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can login successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Open login screen.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Tap the login button.
Verify successful login and navigation to home screen.

title: Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the login fails gracefully when invalid credentials are submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Enter invalid email or password.
Tap the login button.
Verify error message is shown and user remains on login screen.

title: Home Screen Displays Categories and Featured Products
description: Validate that the home screen shows product categories and featured products correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to home screen.
Check product categories are displayed.
Check featured products are visible and rendered correctly.

title: Filter Products by Category, Gender, and Price
description: Ensure that product filtering by category, gender, and price applies correctly and updates results.

steps.description: Open category or search filter screen.
Apply filters: select a specific category, gender, and price range.
Validate that product results update according to selected filters.

title: Search Products with No Filters Returns All or Relevant Results
description: Check that searching without filters returns all relevant products without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the search screen.
Perform a search query without applying any filters.
Verify that relevant products matching the query are returned and displayed.

title: View Product Details with Variants
description: Verify users can navigate to a product detail page and select available variants properly.

steps.description: Select a product from the home or search result.
Product details load including images, description, and available variants.
Select different product variants (e.g., size, color).
Variant selection updates product details and price accordingly.

title: Add Products to Cart and Manage Quantities
description: Validate that products can be added to cart and quantities can be modified or removed correctly from cart screen.

steps.description: From product detail, add product to cart.
Product appears in cart with correct details and default quantity.
Increase and decrease product quantity in cart.
Cart updates quantity and subtotal accordingly.
Remove product from cart.
Product is removed and cart updates correctly.

title: Complete Checkout Process with Validation
description: Ensure the checkout process completes correctly with address input, payment method selection, and order confirmation.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout from cart screen.
Enter valid shipping address information.
Select a supported payment method.
Confirm the order.
Order confirmation is received and user is navigated to order summary.

title: Checkout Validation Errors for Missing or Invalid Data
description: Verify error messages are displayed when mandatory checkout information is missing or invalid.

steps.description: Start checkout without entering shipping address.
Attempt to proceed with incomplete payment details.
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown and checkout cannot be completed.

title: User Profile Data Modification and History Access
description: Check that users can update their profile information and access their order history without issues.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile screen.
Edit and save changes to user data such as name, email, or preferences.
Confirm changes persisted and reflected throughout app.
Access order history from profile screen.
Verify order list displays correctly with accurate details.

title: Notification Center Displays New Alerts
description: Validate notifications and alerts related to orders or promotions appear correctly in notification center.

steps.description: Trigger new notifications such as order status updates.
Open notifications screen.
Verify new notifications appear and can be read or dismissed.

title: Switch Between Light and Dark Themes
description: Ensure the app theme toggles properly between light and dark modes and UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to theme settings.
Toggle from light to dark theme.
Confirm all screens update their color scheme correctly to dark mode.
Toggle back to light theme.
Confirm UI reverts to light theme without visual glitches.

title: Navigation Between Screens Using Go Router
description: Verify that all key navigation flows using the go_router package function smoothly and correctly route between screens.

steps.description: From onboarding, navigate to login, home, product detail, cart, checkout, profile, and settings screens sequentially.
Confirm all navigations occur without delay, errors, or incorrect screen loads.

title: Reusability and Consistency of UI Components
description: Check that reusable components such as product cards, search bars, and tab bars render correctly and maintain design consistency across screens.

steps.description: Navigate to screens that use product cards (home, search results).
Validate product cards display uniform layout, styling, and data.
Check search bars on relevant screens for correct placement and functionality.
Test tab bars for correct navigation response and visual consistency.

title: App Responsiveness on Various Screen Sizes
description: Validate the app adapts layout and usability correctly across multiple device screen sizes and orientations.

steps.description: Open the app on devices/emulators with small, medium, and large screen sizes.
Verify UI elements remain properly aligned, visible, and usable on all screen sizes.
Rotate device orientation from portrait to landscape.
Confirm the interface adjusts accordingly without layout breakage.

title: Handle Missing Product Data Gracefully
description: Ensure the app handles cases where product information or variants are incomplete or missing without crashing.

steps.description: Load product detail screen for products with incomplete data (e.g., no variants, missing images).
Verify app displays placeholders or informative messages instead of crashing.

title: Order History Reflects Recent Orders Accurately
description: Check that after placing an order, the order appears in the order history with correct details.

steps.description: Complete a new order through checkout.
Navigate to order history screen.
Confirm the new order is listed with accurate status, date, items, and total.
